reviewText: Benedict's wonderful acting made this film from interesting by reading Van Gogh's letters to sublime. I searched all over looking for it, until I found it in Australia!  Why isn't it available more easily? If you see this film, you'll never forget it.
it did not play on my blue ray dvd player so mad

Benedict Cumberbatch is a wonderful actor and he did a great job portraying Vincent Van Gogh.  I like how the writers used Van Gogh's journals to tell his life story.  Very interesting and would definitely recommend.
